docs.title: Setting Position and Effect (Forged in the Dark)
The Royal Game of the Goose
Introduction: What is this game about?
docs.text:
Following Jared Sorensen's Three Big Questions I would like to introduce Sprezzatura as a game about cooperative storytelling, unexpected narratives, character growth and wit. The game is based on a custom game-engine called the Resonance System: a cooperative dice-poll system inspired by Pythagorean intervals and the Harmony of the Spheres.

Furthermore, at the players' disposal comes a metacurrency system based on Major and Minor Arcanas of tarots. Finally, the long-term growth of the story and characters is regulated by a mini-game similar to the Royal Game of the Goose.

Interaction and sharing agency on the story with other players is encouraged by the Resonance System, while living up to their character's believes and motivations will provide more metacurrency cards to control dice-poll's randomness.
